      • SendReply

        public static void SendReply(byte[] reply,
                             java.net.InetAddress addr,
                             int port)
                      throws java.io.IOException,
                             java.net.SocketException
        Sends a reply to the client.
        Parameters:
        reply - Object returning as a reply flattened to a byte array.
        addr - Address we are sending to. (In this case, localhost)
        port - Client's port number we are sending this to.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        java.net.SocketException

      • getCurrentSession

        public static java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> getCurrentSession(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> logText)
        Searches for the most recent successful login for the current user to narrow down the search for duplicate processes
        Parameters:
        logText - a list of every line of the log
        Returns:
        list of all lines after and including the most recent successful sign in request

      • processAlreadyExecuted

        public static boolean processAlreadyExecuted(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> currentSession,
                                             Message msg)
        Checks if the current process has already been received by the server in another thread
        Parameters:
        currentSession - all lines of the log since the most recent sign in
        msg - the message being checked
        Returns:
        true if the message has already been received by the server
